title: Fly Trap
content:
ap Information

Chance to Ensnare target if it is not a plant or a beast.

Equipment that provides Fly Trap

Fly Trap Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here

Note: Currently only works with melee attacks not ranged spells or cantrips.

Equipment Features Absolute Bane ♦ Absolute Night ♦ Absolute Power ♦ Absolute Protection ♦ Adamantine Backlash ♦ Adamantine Shield (Equipment Feature) ♦ Adrenaline Rush ♦ Adroit Caster ♦ Aegis Palms ♦ Ancient Grudges ♦ Angelclocker Knuckles ♦ Arcane Ammunition ♦ Arcan
